/usr/bin/c++    -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names   CMakeFiles/playcap.dir/AboutWindow.o CMakeFiles/playcap.dir/InterfaceWindow.o CMakeFiles/playcap.dir/main.o CMakeFiles/playcap.dir/PlaybackWindow.o  -o playcap  -L/opt/local/lib -lFOX-1.6 -lX11 -lXext -lfreetype -lXft -lXcursor -lXrender -lXrandr -lXfixes -lXi -lGL -lGLU -ldl -lpthread -ljpeg -lpng -ltiff -lz -lbz2 -lGLU -lGL -lpcap -lpthread
